remarks: A ball belongs to the set of balls of a metric space.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Sep-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
statement: blelrnps $p |- ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ P e. X /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) e. ran ( ball ` D ) ) $.
